text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Alex Azar must go to make room for someone who makes healthcare #MAGA2020. Sorry, this is not time to tell me who is doing an excellent #coronavirus job as people are fucking dying left and right. The US is leading on #COVID19 deaths as if our Country has a billion population.
